IV administration amifostine 200 mg/m2/day short 3-min infusion 15 30 min fraction radiotherapy . SC administration 500mg/day two slow 1.25 ml injection two different site 20 60 min radiotherapy fraction . Procedure require antiemetic treatment blood pressure monitoring arm .
